com.eis.greenenergy.connection

Class Login

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.eis.greenenergy.connection.Login

  • public class Login
extends
    Class which defines an AsyncTask to access the user-login-data stored in an external database.
    The purpose of this task is to verify user data, which was retrieved within the application, by
    comparing it to user data which is stored in the database. In short, this task represents the login of
    the user on data level. The accomplishment of this task includes connecting to a PHP script which
    runs on the same server as the external database.
    Since:
    2014-05-30
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Veronika Henk, Sarvenaz Golchin, Mahnaz Hajibaba

    • Method Detail

      • onPreExecute

        protected void onPreExecute()
        Defines what needs to be done before the network connection is established.
        A progress dialog is created and displayed as an indication to the user to wait until the network request is completed.

      • doInBackground

        protected java.lang.String doInBackground(java.lang.String... arg0)
        Sends a request with user data to a web service in order to verify the data.
        The web services compares the sent data with the user data stored in the external database.
        Parameters:
        arg0[0] - Username, which was retrieved as the user's input.
        arg0[1] - Password, which was retrieved as the user's input.
        Returns:
        Result of the network request, which is 0 if the verification was successful;
        1 if no connection to the web service could be established;
        2 if the username does not exist in the database;
        3 if the password does not match the password stored in the database.

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(java.lang.String result)
        Defines what needs to be done after the network connection is closed.
        The progress dialog, which was created earlier, is dismissed.
        Parameters:
        result - Result of the operation conducted in the doInBackground() method.
